nodes.text: Vladlun Travan's Hideout was a bunker located in the Madyn Plains region of Naboo's swamp moon of Rori during the time of the Galactic Civil War. The hideout was controlled by Vladlun Travan and his fellow band of cronies.

Circa 1 ABY, the Narmle Militia was able to confirm the presence of Vladlun Travan in the bunker and gave this information to Wernell Covington whose daughter Felicia had been murdered by Travan years ago. Covington sent a spacer to the hideout and the latter killed Vladlun Travan to avenge the murder of Covington's daughter. In the bunker, the spacer also encountered the bounty hunter Boba Fett who was tracking three associates of Travan: Titus Dabrini, Aztin Maru and Tiaba Charr. Fett decided to let the spacer eliminate Travan and his fellow supporters.

Vladlun Travan's Hideout was a location in the 2003 massively multiplayer online role-playing game Star Wars Galaxies, prior to the game's closure on December 15, 2011. Vladlun Travan's Hideout was added to the game with the release of the "Game Update 12", on August 10, 2009.
